mainText:
Dear friends and family of Steve Jobs:

My thoughts go out to you during this difficult time. The world has lost
 a creative genius today. I have been a fan of the Apple brand for many years because of Steve's amazing creativity and innovation. My first Apple product was the iPod Mini. I thought it was the greatest invention of the world and nothing else could ever
 top that. Then just a few years later, the iPhone came, which I feel it will become one of the most revolutionary new products of the 21st century. And
 we owe it all to Steve Jobs and the amazing team at Apple.

Today, I feel I've lost a friend. But the world must go on and I look forward to the technology and innovation Apple will bring us in the future.
author: Melissa
